docsTags.text: top - Content is placed at the top of the screen.

methods.name: getTab
methods.docs: Get a specific tab by the value of its `tab` property or an element reference.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: tab The tab instance to select. If passed a string, it should be the value of the tab's `tab` property.

methods.name: select
methods.docs: Select a tab by the value of its `tab` property or an element reference.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: tab The tab instance to select. If passed a string, it should be the value of the tab's `tab` property.

events.docs: Emitted when the navigation has finished transitioning to a new component.
Emitted when the navigation is about to transition to a new component.

slots.docs: Content is placed between the named slots if provided without a slot.

slots.name: bottom
slots.docs: Content is placed at the bottom of the screen.

slots.name: top
slots.docs: Content is placed at the top of the screen.
